location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], Writing from Maghil, Near Bussora, to Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 12 August 1802, Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], accepts a request from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, for the Shannonto touch at Bushire on its way to the Presidency. Manesty requests information regarding the final sales at Bushire of the consignment of woollens that were carried by the Governor Duncanand the Diamond, in 1801.
